articles.title: Meta is shelling out big bucks to get ahead in AI. Here’s who it’s hiring
articles.summary: Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg is on a mission for his company to be the first to reach so-called artificial superintelligence — generally considered to mean AI that’s better than all humans at all knowledge work.

articles.title: Delta Air Lines says it won't use AI to set ticket prices
articles.summary: Delta Air Lines said Friday it will not use artificial intelligence to set personalized ticket prices for passengers after facing sharp criticism from lawmakers.
